name: Helicopter Jungle Flight LT
description:
Engage yourself in this arcade game of a helicopter vs airplane combat! Control your helicopter and eliminate all the enemies. Watch out - some of the enemies needs more often to be hit!

You control the helicopter with the left and right paddle. Avoid all the bombs and don't colliding with the airplanes.

Collect the 5 powerups to improve your helicopter with more weapons, faster weapons, big bomb, moving speed or a shield. The more enemies you blow up, the higher chances of having powerups!

Features
-Nice 2D graphics and sounds
-Progressively harder gameplay
-5 Powerups to stuff your heli
-Save and load high score
-Universal version for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
